scripts.build-all: sh -c 'cd "$PWD" && echo "ğŸ§¹ Cleaning..." && rm -rf npm && echo "ğŸ—ï¸  Building..." && deno run -A _build_npm.ts && echo "ğŸ“¦ Installing dependencies..." && cd test-app && pnpm install && echo "ğŸ”— Linking package..." && pnpm link ../npm && echo "âœ… Done!"'
scripts.prepare-publish: sh -c 'cd "$PWD" && echo "ğŸ§¹ Cleaning..." && rm -rf npm && echo "ğŸ—ï¸  Building..." && deno run -A _build_npm.ts && echo "ğŸ“¦ Publishing to npm..." && cd npm && pnpm publish --access public && echo "âœ… Published!"'
